line.originaltext: 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
1/2 cup butter, softened
1/2 cup white sugar
1/2 cup packed brown sugar
2 eggs
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 cups all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon baking powder
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
Melt the chocolate chips in a heavy saucepan over very low heat.
Melt the chocolate chips in a heavy saucepan over very low heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t0, ing9, "melted chocolate", "melt over very low heat")

line.originaltext: Stir to evenly melt.
line.annotation: mix(ing9, t0, ing10, "melted chocolate", "stir to evenly melt")

line.originaltext: Cream together the butter and sugars until light.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing11, "butter mix", "cream together until light")

line.originaltext: Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing4}, ing12, "egg butter mix", "beat in the eggs, one at a time")

line.originaltext: Stir in the melted chocolate and vanilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing12, ing5}, ing13, "chocolate and vanilla", "stir in")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and baking soda.
In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and baking soda.
line.annotation: combine({ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing14, "dry ingredients", "whisk together")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and baking soda.
Add to the butter mixture slowly.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing14}, ing15, "dough", "add dry ingredients to butter mixture slowly")

line.originaltext: Blend thoroughly.
Shape into 1-inch balls and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Shape into 1-inch balls and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Shape into 1-inch balls and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 12 to 14 minutes.
Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 12 to 14 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t3, ing18, "cookies", "bake at 350 degrees F for 12 to 14 minutes")

line.originaltext: Let sit on cookie sheet for a minute or two before removing to a rack to cool.
line.annotation: leave(ing18,"let sit for a minute or two")
